# Privacy Policy

This product respects and protects the personal privacy of all users using the service. By using or continuing to use our services, you agree that we can collect, use, store and share your relevant information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to all the contents of this Privacy Policy, please stop using our services immediately.

When you use our services, we may collect and use your relevant information. We want to explain to you through this Privacy Policy how we collect, use, store and share this information when you use our services, as well as how we provide you with access, updates, control and protection of this information. This Privacy Policy is closely related to the services you use, and we hope you read it carefully and make appropriate choices according to the guidelines in this Privacy Policy when needed. We try to explain the relevant technical terms in this Privacy Policy in a simple and concise manner, and provide links for further explanation to facilitate your understanding.

## Scope

When you use our network services or access our platform webpages, the information on your browser and computer that is automatically received and recorded by this product includes but is not limited to your IP address, browser type, language used, access date and time, software and hardware feature information, and web page records required by you, etc. You understand and agree that the following information is not subject to this privacy policy:

-   The relevant information data collected by this product (if any) published by us, including but not limited to participation activities, transaction information and evaluation details;
-   Behaviors that violate laws and regulations or violate the rules of this product, and measures that this product has taken against you.

## Use of Information

In order to provide you with a better experience, improve our services or for other purposes you agree to, we may use the collected information to provide services, process orders, send updates or product announcements, respond to your requests or questions, etc. in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. For example, the information collected when you use one of our services may be used to provide specific content to you in another service, or to show you information related to you that is not generally pushed. If we provide corresponding options in related services, you can also authorize us to use the information provided and stored by the service for our other services.

-   This product will not provide, sell, rent, share or trade your personal information to any unrelated third party without your prior permission, unless the third party alone or jointly with this product (including affiliated products) provides services to you, and after the service ends, it will be prohibited from accessing all the information including what it could previously access.
-   This product also does not allow any third party to collect, edit, sell or distribute your personal information free of charge in any way. Once such activities are discovered by any user of this product platform, this product has the right to immediately terminate the service agreement with that user.
-   We may use the information collected during the course of providing services to you for the following purposes:
    -   To provide services to you;
    -   To use for identity verification, customer service, security prevention, fraud monitoring, archiving and backup purposes to ensure the security of the products and services we provide to you when we provide services;
    -   To help us design new services and improve our existing services;
    -   To help us better understand how you access and use our services so that we can respond to your personalized needs in a targeted manner, such as language settings, location settings, personalized assistance services and instructions, or respond to you and other users in other aspects;
    -   To provide you with ads that are more relevant to you instead of general ads;
    -   To evaluate the effectiveness of advertisements and other promotional and promotional activities in our services, and improve them;
    -   Software certification or software upgrade management;
    -   Allow you to participate in surveys about our products and services.

We will make every effort to take appropriate technical measures to ensure that you can access, update and correct your registered information or other personal information provided when using our services. When accessing, updating, correcting and deleting the aforementioned information, we may require you to verify your identity in order to ensure account security.

## Disclosure of Information

Under the following circumstances, this product will disclose all or part of your personal information in accordance with your personal wishes or legal regulations:

-   Disclosure to third parties with your prior consent;
-   It is necessary to share your personal information with third parties in order to provide the products and services you request;
-   If you violate relevant laws and regulations of the jurisdiction you are in, or the service agreement or related rules of this product, it is necessary to disclose to third parties;
-   As an eligible complainant of intellectual property rights who has filed a complaint, disclose to the accused at the request of the accused for both parties to deal with possible rights disputes;
-   Disclose to third parties or administrative or judicial institutions in accordance with relevant provisions of laws and regulations or requirements of administrative or judicial institutions;
-   Other purposes that are reasonably necessary to comply with applicable laws and regulations, safeguard public interests, or protect the personal and property safety or legitimate rights and interests of our customers, us, other users.
-   In a transaction created on this product platform, if either party to the transaction has fulfilled or partially fulfilled the transaction obligation and requested to disclose information, this product has the right to decide to provide the counterparty with necessary information such as contact information to facilitate the completion of the transaction or dispute resolution;
-   Other disclosures that we deem appropriate in accordance with laws, regulations or policies, as well as the fulfillment of our obligations and the exercise of our rights under this Privacy Policy.

If we share your personal information with any of the above third parties, we will make efforts to ensure that such third parties comply with this Privacy Policy and other appropriate confidentiality and security measures required by us when using your personal information.

As our business continues to grow, we may conduct mergers, acquisitions, transfer of assets or similar transactions, and your personal information may be transferred as part of such transactions. We will notify you before the transfer, and you can choose whether to be transferred.

## Information Security

We only retain your personal information for the duration necessary for the purposes stated in this Privacy Policy and for the period required by laws and regulations. We use data encryption, Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) technology, and security audits to ensure the security of your personal data and prevent information loss, misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure.

For example, in some services, we will use encryption technology (such as SSL) to protect the personal information you provide. But please understand that due to technical limitations and the existence of various malicious means, it is impossible to guarantee 100% security of information in the Internet industry, even if security measures are strengthened as much as possible. You need to understand that the systems and communication networks used to access our services may have problems due to factors beyond our controllable range.

### Information You Share

Please note that any information shared in public areas may be viewed and used by others. We recommend that you consider the potential consequences before sharing information, and we will not be responsible for any consequences.

For example, the information you upload or post in our services (including your personal information disclosed to the public, the lists you create), your responses to information uploaded or posted by others, as well as location data and log information related to this information. Other users of our services may also share information about you (including location data and log information).

In particular, our social media services are designed to enable you to share information with users around the world in real time and extensively. As long as you do not delete the shared information, the relevant information will remain in the public domain;

Even if you delete shared information, relevant information may still be independently cached, copied or stored by other users or third parties not under our control, or retained in the public domain by other users or third parties.

Therefore, please carefully consider the content of the information you upload, post and communicate through our services. In some cases, you can control the scope of users who can browse your shared information through the privacy settings of some of our services. To request deletion of your relevant information from our services, please operate through the methods provided in the special terms of service.

### Sensitive Personal Information You Share

Some personal information may be considered sensitive personal information due to its particularity, such as your race, religion, personal health and medical information. Compared with other personal information, sensitive personal information is subject to stricter protection.

Please note that the content and information you provide, upload or post when using our services (such as photos of your social activities) may reveal your sensitive personal information.

You need to carefully consider whether to disclose relevant sensitive personal information when using our services. You agree to handle your sensitive personal information in accordance with the purposes and methods described in this Privacy Policy.

### How We May Collect Information

We or our third party partners may collect and use your information through cookies and web beacons, and store such information as log information. If you do not reject accepting cookies, this product will set or use cookies on your computer so that you can log in or use product platform services or functions that rely on cookies. This product uses cookies to provide you with more thoughtful personalized services, including promotional services.

We use our own cookies and web beacons for the following purposes:

-   Remember your identity. For example: Cookies and web beacons help us recognize your identity as our registered user, or save your preferences or other information you provide to us about your preferences;
-   Analyze your use of our services. For example, we can use cookies and web beacons to understand what activities you are doing using our services, or which web pages or services are most popular with you;

You have the right to choose to accept or reject cookies. You can reject cookies by modifying your browser settings. However, if you choose to reject cookies, you may not be able to log in or use product network services or features that rely on cookies. The information obtained through the cookies set by this product will be subject to this policy.

### Account and Transaction Security

The accounts of this product have security protection functions. Please keep your user name and password information properly. This product will ensure that your information is not lost, abused and tampered with through encryption of user passwords and other security measures. Despite the aforementioned security measures, please also note that there are no "perfect security measures" on the information network.

When using our network services for online transactions, you will inevitably have to disclose your personal information such as contact information or mailing address to the transaction counterpart or potential transaction counterpart. Please properly protect your personal information and provide it to others only when necessary. If you find that your personal information has been leaked, especially the user name and password of this product, please contact customer service immediately so that this product can take corresponding measures.

## Notifications and Announcements

### Email and Information Push

When using our services, we may use your information to send emails, news or push notifications to your device. If you do not want to receive this information, you can unsubscribe on your device according to our relevant prompts.

### Service-related announcements

We may issue service-related announcements to you when necessary (for example, when a service is suspended due to system maintenance). For example: major updates, security warnings or your account activity.

## Exceptions to the Application of Privacy Policy

Our services may include or link to third-party provided social media or other services (including websites). Please pay attention to the privacy policies and user agreements of third-party services when using third-party services. For example:

-   When you use the "Share" button to share certain content to our services, or when you log in to our services using third-party connection services, these features may collect your relevant information (including your log information) and cookies may be installed on your computer device to properly operate the above functions;
-   The links generated by this service to third-party services may direct you to third-party services or websites.
-   We provide you with links to access third-party services or websites through advertising or other methods of our services.

Such third-party services or other services may be operated by the relevant third-party or us. Your use of such third-party social media services or other services (including any personal information provided to such third-party) is subject to the terms of service and privacy policy of that third-party (rather than the User Service Agreement or this Privacy Policy of this service), and you need to read their terms carefully. This Privacy Policy applies only to the information we collect and is not applicable to any third-party use rules for information, and we are not responsible for any third-party use of information provided by you.

## Minors Using Our Services

We do not support the use of this service by minors without the consent of their parents or guardians. Minors must use under the guidance of their parents or guardians.

-   If a minor needs to use the service, the minor's parent or guardian must read this Privacy Policy and seek the consent and guidance of the parent or guardian before submitting personal information and using the service, otherwise the service should not be used;
-   For situations where we learn that personal information of minors has been collected without the consent of parents or guardians, we will take measures to delete relevant data, including but not limited to generated user data or account information;
-   If a parent or guardian finds that their minor has provided personal data without consent, they can contact us to correct or delete it;
-   If we find that information about minors has been overlooked and not deleted in the past, you can contact us at [aivesa@outlook.com](mailto:aivesa@outlook.com "aivesa@outlook.com") to require us to delete relevant information in a timely manner.

## Changes

We may revise the terms of this Privacy Policy from time to time, and such revisions will form part of this Privacy Policy. If such revisions substantially reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy, we will notify you of the revisions taking effect by prominently displaying them on the homepage or by sending you an email or otherwise notifying you before the revisions take effect.

In this case, if you continue to use our services, you will be deemed to have known and agreed to be bound by the revised Privacy Policy.

If we make material changes to our privacy policy, we will post those changes in this policy, the product itself and where we deem appropriate so that you are aware of how we collect, use your personal information, who can access it, and under what circumstances we will disclose it. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or related matters, or do not agree to be bound by the revised Privacy Policy, please contact us at [aivesa@outlook.com](mailto:aivesa@outlook.com "aivesa@outlook.com") to object or request account deletion.
